title: Bloodbath - Discography
description:
Bloodbath is a truly incredible Death Metal band.  Their CD, Nightmares Made Flesh, is easily one of the greatest Death Metal CDs of all time.  With tracks like "Cancer of the Soul" and "Eaten" who can argue.

Brutal? yes
Worth Downloading? yes
Should you seed? of course.

Bloodbath

1. Breeding Death
2. Ominous Bloodvomit
3. Furnace Funeral

2. So You Die
3. Mass Strangulation
4. Death Delirium
5. Buried by the Dead
6. Soulcollector
7. Bathe in Blood
8. Trail of Insects
9. Like Fire
10.Cry My Name
